channel.title: Spirit AeroSystems on FinanClub

item.title: 0848 SPR
item.description: score:848 Chances: Spirit AeroSystems’ Q2 revenues of $1,365 million surpassed the Zacks Consensus Estimate by 7.4%, indicating strong performance in the quarter. The top line of Spirit AeroSystems rose 8% on a year-over-year basis, which may signal growth in the company’s business. Although the stock reported disappointing Q2 results, there may be a chance for a turnaround if the supply chain issues and labor costs are effectively addressed.
